pilots.name: Black Sun Ace
pilots.text: The Khiraxz assault fighter was developed specifically for the Black Sun crime syndicate whose highly paid ace pilots demanded a nimble powerful ship to match their skills.

pilots.name: Captain Jostero
pilots.caption: Aggressive Opportunist
pilots.ability: After an enemy ship suffers damage, if it is not defending, you may perform a bonus attack against that ship.

pilots.name: Cartel Marauder
pilots.text: The versatile Kihraxz was modeled after Incom's popular X-wing starfighter, but an array of after-market modifications kits ensure a wide variety of designs.

pilots.name: Graz
pilots.caption: The Hunter
pilots.ability: While you defend, if you are behind the attacker, roll 1 additional defense die. While you perform an attack, if you are behind the defender, roll 1 additional attack die.

pilots.name: Talonbane Cobra
pilots.caption: Scourge of Tansarii Point
pilots.ability: While you defend at attack range 3 or perform an attack at attack range 1, roll 1 additional die.

pilots.name: Viktor Hel
pilots.caption: Storied Bounty Hunter
pilots.ability: After you defend, if you did not roll exactly 2 defense dice, the attacker gains 1 stress token.
